title.rendered: Eldorado Stone Brings Back the Charm in This Old House

content.rendered: Eldorado Stone is “Bringing Back the Charm” in a 1930’s home that is given a virtual makeover to restore curb appeal. Complete with Eldorado Stone on the chimney, the stone veneer adds heft and ties together the facade’s mix of hues.

excerpt.rendered: Eldorado Stone is “Bringing Back the Charm” in a 1930’s home that is given a virtual makeover to restore curb appeal. Complete with Eldorado Stone on the chimney, the stone veneer adds heft and ties together the facade’s mix of hues.
